text: Tomara ki bala ye, ‘abasya'i ibarahima, isama'ila, isahaka, iyakuba o tamra bansadharagana iyahudi ba nasara chila’? Baluna, ‘tomara ki besi jana, na allah‌ ? Tara ceye besi yalima ara ke hate pare ye allah‌ra kacha theke tara kache ye saksya ache ta gopana kare? Ara tomara ya kara se samparke allah‌ gaphela nana
